Posts.Content: Hi Carole. How strange.... same name, scans and biopsy on same day, same results and surgery in same week! It is a lot for us to get our heads round, i am the same with the sleepless nights, also very tearful all the time. I have long hair too, an unusual gold and blonde kinda colour. Its taken me ages to grow it long and like you, am worried about losing it, although, one lady replied to me on here with a really positive comment. She said, she lost her hair and wore a wig. Now her hair has grown back she said she is not liking having to get up half hour earlier to style her hair before she goes out!  It may sound a bit flippent but when i read that comment it kinda made me chuckle and think.... Yeah, i spend ages in the morning doing my hair.. at least i will have more time! Our hair will grow back.   The thoughts in our head are the hardest thing because, dont know about you, but i always think the worst and the what ifs. Its also the fact of not knowing what will happen next. Once surgery is done we will get our heads around that, then we will have to face the next challenge. I hope we can stay in touch and it might help us both if we can share our experiences.   Good luck and take care Carole xxx
